issue.title: Back projection fixed in gazebo5 still occurs in gazebo7

content.raw:
The fix [is not on 7.0.0](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a29d8dabed9a14fb6bafdcd31c84b160c00b127c/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=gazebo7_7.0.0&fileviewer=file-view-default#Projector.cc-332), but it's [already there](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/cf8652427e7e46880bb9ee3104cb45405e4117a8/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default#Projector.cc-332) on the current `gazebo7` branch. According to the [changelog](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/cf8652427e7e46880bb9ee3104cb45405e4117a8/Changelog.md?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default), it's been released on 7.1.0.

You should be able to upgrade as described [here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=install_ubuntu&ver=7.0#Alternativeinstallation:step-by-step).
content.html:
The fix is not on 7.0.0, but it's already there on the current gazebo7 branch. According to the changelog, it's been released on 7.1.0.

You should be able to upgrade as described here.
